name: kiss-translator
description: A minimalist bilingual translation Extension & Greasemonkey Script
author: Gabe<yugang2002@gmail.com>

scripts.build:chrome: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build/chrome', { recursive: true, force: true });" && cross-env BUILD_PATH=./build/chrome REACT_APP_CLIENT=chrome react-app-rewired build && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build/chrome/content.html', { force: true });"
scripts.build:safari-output: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build/safari', { recursive: true, force: true });" && cross-env BUILD_PATH=./build/safari REACT_APP_CLIENT=safari react-app-rewired build && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build/safari/content.html', { force: true });"
scripts.build:edge: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build/edge', { recursive: true, force: true });" && node -e "require('fs').cpSync('build/chrome', 'build/edge', { recursive: true });"
scripts.build:thunderbird: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build/thunderbird', { recursive: true, force: true });" && cross-env BUILD_PATH=./build/thunderbird REACT_APP_CLIENT=thunderbird react-app-rewired build && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build/thunderbird/content.html', { force: true });" && node -e "require('fs').cpSync('./build/thunderbird/manifest.thunderbird.json', './build/thunderbird/manifest.json');" && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build/*/manifest.thunderbird.json', { force: true });"
scripts.build:firefox: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build/firefox', { recursive: true, force: true });" && cross-env BUILD_PATH=./build/firefox REACT_APP_CLIENT=firefox react-app-rewired build && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build/firefox/content.html', { force: true });" && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('./build/firefox/manifest.json', fs.readFileSync('./build/firefox/manifest.firefox.json'));" && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build/*/manifest.firefox.json', { force: true });"
scripts.build:web: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build/web', { recursive: true, force: true });" && cross-env BUILD_PATH=./build/web REACT_APP_CLIENT=userscript react-app-rewired build
scripts.build:userscript-ios: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const file1='build/web/kiss-translator.user.js'; const file2='build/web/kiss-translator-ios-safari.user.js'; fs.copyFileSync(file1, file2); let content = fs.readFileSync(file2, 'utf-8'); content = content.replace('// @grant         unsafeWindow', '// @inject-into   content'); fs.writeFileSync(file2, content);"
scripts.build:userscript: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build/userscript', { recursive: true, force: true });" && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('build/userscript', { recursive: true });" && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const files = fs.readdirSync('build/web'); files.filter(f => f.endsWith('.user.js')).forEach(f => fs.copyFileSync(path.join('build/web', f), path.join('build/userscript', f)));"
scripts.build: pnpm format && pnpm build:chrome && pnpm build:edge && pnpm build:thunderbird && pnpm build:firefox && pnpm build:web && pnpm build:userscript-ios && pnpm build:userscript && pnpm build:rules
scripts.zip: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); fs.rmSync('build/*.zip', { force: true }); execSync('cd build && powershell Compress-Archive -Path chrome -DestinationPath chrome.zip -Force'); execSync('cd build && powershell Compress-Archive -Path edge -DestinationPath edge.zip -Force'); execSync('cd build && powershell Compress-Archive -Path userscript -DestinationPath userscript.zip -Force'); execSync('cd build/firefox && powershell Compress-Archive -Path * -DestinationPath ../firefox.zip -Force'); execSync('cd build/thunderbird && powershell Compress-Archive -Path * -DestinationPath ../thunderbird.zip -Force');"
